page.title: 14VILLAGE ASSOC.BRAISHFIELD
page.content: This was started in 1974 to encourage people to take an active interest in parish affairs.When a Gas pressure reducing installation was proposed,the B.V.A.organised public meetings,the result being a quiet,well hidden station.Public meetings were also held over the scheduled oil drilling. Theidea of a new Village hall and the re-starting of the village flower show came from the B.V.A. They sponsored the start of a Scout troop,Cub pack & Senior citizens club.They have provided hard-standing at a bus-stop, pressured for improved safety at a dangerous cross-roads and are improving the village pond.A news- letter is produced bi-monthly, and a booklet of local information is given to all new residents,which gives details of all village organisations.
